##Bio

Ann Coulter was [born in 1774](../Isaac B Vanarsdall/Censuses/1850 Census.jpg) to John Coulter in Kentucky. She [married](../Isaac B Vanarsdall/Marriage Liscense.jpg) Isaac B Vanarsdall in 1812, and their daughter Olive was born soon after. By [1840](../Isaac B Vanarsdall/Censuses/Possible 1840 Census.jpg) she, her husband, and three of their children were living together in Mercer County, Kentucky. By [1850](../Isaac B Vanarsdall/Censuses/1850 Census.jpg) she and Isaac were living alone. By [1860](../Isaac B Vanarsdall/Censuses/1860 Slave Schedule.jpg), they had a fourteen year old male slave.
